message.body: Are u up for a walk tonight?
As long as we're not going to get poured on, yes definitely!
Cool. I may need to swing by the liquor store if u don't mind.
Sure. what time are you thinking?
Around 6 at the latest. I have a friend coming tonight and I have some serious cleaning to do before she arrives.
Well... Some cleaning and a lot of hiding all my crap!
This is why I also need wine!
OK!
Hey- I'm still at work and I'm not sure if I'll be able to leave by 5:30. If not, I may have to take a rain check on the walk. Will keep u posted.
No worries. Would love to see you but it sounds like you have a pretty crazy evening already!
Might still work. This vendor stood me up for lunch an somehow this has messed up my whole day! Not to mention no free sushi!
Clearly you should never use this vendor again! Let's just raincheck for a less crazy day. And enjoy your visit with your friend!
Thank you. I'm sorry.
Don't worry about it!

Thanks! I was gonna ask if u would mind taking a set of my keys in case of an emergency. I'm going to go to ######### for a concert tomorrow night and even tho I'm sure ####### will be ok, it would be a huge help if I knew someone was close by if needed.
Sure. I'm headed out for a while and won't be back until late tonight but if you'll be up I can swing by on my way home
That works. I know I'll be up late. Thanks!
You home?
Yes. Sorry, if it is too late don't worry about it.
I'll be outside in two min
K. Be right out.
